name: deck.gl
description: A suite of 3D-enabled data visualization overlays, suitable for react-map-gl

scripts.start: (cd examples/layer-browser && (path-exists node_modules || npm i) && npm run start-local)
scripts.clean-modules: for D in src/*; do ([ -d $D ] && cd $D && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6 ); done
scripts.clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist/es5 dist/esm dist/es6
scripts.build-size: (echo "source size" ; find src/ -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist esm size" ; find dist/esm -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c) && (echo "dist/es6 size" ; find dist/es6 -name '*.js' | xargs cat | wc -c)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-esm && npm run build-es5 && npm run build-size && npm run collect-metrics
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: prettier-check "{src,examples,test}/**/*.js" && eslint src test examples && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) && echo 'Lockfile valid.' || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser && npm run test-render-react
scripts.test-ci: node test/start.js test-ci && npm run build && npm run collect-metrics
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
scripts.test-size-es6: npm run build-es6 && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config test/webpack.config.js --env.import-nothing --env.es6
